attributes.action: STOP CERN IN GENEVA. WE DONT WANT A BLACK HOLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CERN have created a machine that basically smashes atoms together to create new atoms. all fine and dandy you say. NO. it is going to have one of 3 options. OTTION 1) create a new earth as they think they was how earth was created, you do the math, There is not much room on Earth to fit another Earth. OPTION 2) Create a black hole. im sure i dont have to tell you that black holes are bad crack. The whole of the earth will be pulled to its centre and destroyed. OPTION 3) Nothing happens..

so, theres a 1 in 3 chance we will be ok. I dont like these odds. I think that its our Human rights that if there is a chance of destroying the Earth we should be at least asked about it.

Here are a couple of links.

A black hole does this 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BXzugu39pKM

The CERN website

http://public.web.cern.ch/Public/Welcome.html

A CERN SCIENTIST SAYING THE WORLD COULD END 

http://public.web.cern.ch/Public/Welcome.html
